prompts.title: First Day Outfit
prompts.description: Kids can design and color their perfect first day of school outfit.

prompts.title: School Bus Adventure
prompts.description: A fun ride to school with friends, featuring a cheerful school bus and kids waving from the windows.

prompts.title: Build Your Backpack
prompts.description: A backpack outline kids can fill and color with their school supplies.

prompts.title: My Dream Classroom
prompts.description: An imaginative classroom filled with rainbows, stars, and fun desks.

prompts.title: Lunchbox Surprise
prompts.description: Color a lunchbox full of tasty, silly, or magical foods.

prompts.title: Crayon Friends
prompts.description: Friendly animated crayons introducing themselves and ready to color the world.

prompts.title: Pencil Parade
prompts.description: Marching pencils with hats, drums, and flags celebrating the start of school.

prompts.title: My Favorite Subject
prompts.description: An open-ended scene kids can fill with art, science, reading, or math symbols.

prompts.title: Teacher Time
prompts.description: A kind teacher greeting students in a welcoming classroom.

prompts.title: Magical Library
prompts.description: A whimsical library where books fly and stories come to life.

prompts.title: Alphabet Forest
prompts.description: A forest filled with trees shaped like letters and animals hiding nearby.

prompts.title: Number Zoo
prompts.description: A zoo where each animal’s body is made of numbers 1–10.

prompts.title: Recess Playground
prompts.description: A joyful recess scene with swings, slides, jump ropes, and happy kids.

prompts.title: Science Lab Fun
prompts.description: Beakers, rockets, and colorful experiments in a kid-friendly lab.

prompts.title: Art Time Explosion
prompts.description: Paint brushes, palettes, and canvases exploding with creativity.

prompts.title: Music Class Band
prompts.description: Kids playing different instruments in a fun classroom concert.

prompts.title: School Supply Shop
prompts.description: Shelves full of bright pencils, scissors, rulers, and notebooks to color.

prompts.title: Kindness Tree
prompts.description: A tree with leaves that say kind things kids can color and read.

prompts.title: My Desk Setup
prompts.description: A desk scene with space for coloring in books, pencils, gadgets, and notes.

prompts.title: Welcome Banner
prompts.description: A big banner saying 'Welcome Back to School!' with balloons and stars.

prompts.title: Class Pet Party
prompts.description: Class pets (hamster, fish, bird) having a party in their tiny school.

prompts.title: Backpack Monster
prompts.description: A silly monster whose belly is a backpack full of school goodies.

prompts.title: Time for Show and Tell
prompts.description: A kid showing off their favorite toy or drawing to classmates.

prompts.title: Magical School Map
prompts.description: A treasure map-style layout of a fun, imaginary school.

prompts.title: Celebrate With Confetti
prompts.description: A party scene with streamers, confetti, and smiling students.

prompts.title: Locker Decor Ideas
prompts.description: A row of school lockers ready to be colored and personalized.

prompts.title: Field Trip Bus
prompts.description: A magical field trip bus driving through space, underwater, or jungle scenes.

prompts.title: Friendly Notes Exchange
prompts.description: Kids exchanging cheerful notes and drawings in class.

prompts.title: My School Goals
prompts.description: A goal chart with stars, rockets, and positive reminders to color in.

prompts.title: Bookworm’s Den
prompts.description: A cozy corner full of books and a cute cartoon bookworm.

prompts.title: Puzzle Day Challenge
prompts.description: A page full of jumbled school-themed puzzle pieces.

prompts.title: Rainy Day Reading
prompts.description: A child reading by the window with raindrops and imagination clouds.

prompts.title: Welcome Board Designs
prompts.description: A chalkboard with doodles and welcome messages to decorate.

prompts.title: Color the Class Rules
prompts.description: Illustrated class rules with smiling faces and fun fonts.

prompts.title: Favorite School Snack
prompts.description: A menu of snacks like apples, juice boxes, cookies, and quirky sandwiches.

prompts.title: Friends from Every Grade
prompts.description: Kids of all ages together on one colorful playground.

prompts.title: Back to School Maze
prompts.description: A fun maze helping a student find their way to class.

prompts.title: Name Tag Designer
prompts.description: A blank name tag with doodles and space to color and personalize.

prompts.title: School Spirit Day
prompts.description: Students dressed up in school colors with pompoms and banners.

prompts.title: Computer Lab Quest
prompts.description: A techy room with colorful screens and kids learning to type.

prompts.title: Secret Message Code
prompts.description: A colorable code with letters and numbers kids can decode and color.

prompts.title: Write Your Own Schedule
prompts.description: A class schedule template surrounded by doodles and school icons.

prompts.title: Hidden School Objects
prompts.description: A hidden picture page with backpacks, books, and erasers to find and color.

prompts.title: School Bus Safety Superhero
prompts.description: A superhero teaching how to be safe around the bus in a comic-style panel.

prompts.title: School Garden Helpers
prompts.description: Kids planting, watering, and harvesting in a school garden.

prompts.title: Back-to-School Carnival
prompts.description: Games, booths, and prizes at a pretend school carnival.

prompts.title: Silly School Monsters
prompts.description: Silly, non-scary monsters going to school and learning too.

prompts.title: The History Hall
prompts.description: A museum-style hallway with exhibits from history class.

prompts.title: Let's Learn Shapes
prompts.description: A classroom filled with shape characters like triangles and circles with faces.

prompts.title: Around the World in Class
prompts.description: Kids from different cultures sharing and learning together.
